title: How to join C-ISFCR/CDSAML/CCBD during the semester?
content: I’m a 3rd-sem CSE student interested in joining research centers like C-ISFCR, CDSAML, or CCBD. I know they offer summer "internships", but is it possible to work with them during the semester, similar to joining a club? If so, what’s the best way to approach them?

comments.body: You’ll get mails about several opportunities with these centres,you just have to apply and hope you get shortlisted

I heard that CSDAML they make you work A LOT DURING SUMMER

Is that true...?

They don't make you do anything. But it just ends up being a lot of work. 
The thing is that they expect a research paper to come out of your project. And doing a good project, enough to have a presentable paper, in the six weeks is tough. 
But it's nothing too bad. This year it was 9-4 4 days a week. If you put all your efforts during that time right from the beginning you'll be good to go.

Oh okay got it thanks.  
Sadly I'd rather not be a part of it then considering I don't have much interest in research.
